attributes.action: To make Workplace Bullying a criminal offence in line with other forms of abuse.
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of the Dignity at Work Bill is to counteract bullying at work and to enshrine good practice into law. The main objective is to prevent bullying, but if it does take place, then the Bill provides redress. 

 The Bill states that all employees 'shall have a right to dignity at work'.  

For more information on workplace bullying, details on my own devastating effects of workplace bullying, a copy of the proposed bill, visit, www.workplacebullying.me.
attributes.background: Bullying in the workplace is estimated to cost industry three or four billion pounds per year while five billion people currently believe that they are being bullied at work. The Bill aims to remedy this by promoting fairness in the workplace.
